I'd recommend William Wayne Farris' book "Heavenly Warriors" for
informati=
on on the formation of the Kamakura Bakufu. For the Ashikaga
Bakufu I'd rec=
ommend Sansom's "A History of Japan: 1334-1615".

I haven't read a lot on t=
he Tokugawa Bakufu, but Sansom's "A History of
Japan: 1615-1867" probably c=
overs it nicely, as well.

All of these books should be relatively easy to =
track down, and all are
listed on Amazon.com

HTH,

Angus
